activities: Weebly receives personal information from visitors that choose to provide such information on the Weebly website and websites hosted by or built on the Weebly service, such as by submitting their names and contact information at registration or by choosing to disclose and/or post information to the website.  In addition, Weebly may collect certain information automatically from all visitors, including IP addresses, in order to provide and improve our services.  Weebly only uses personal information for products and services provision, support, billing purposes, or communications permitted by and/or required by law.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: The independent recourse mechanisms which are available to investigate unresolved complaints concerning Weebly, Inc.’s compliance with the Safe Harbor framework are:  1.  For consumer data – TRUSTe (see http://truste.com/)
